long_description: Take the Ciao! Baby High Chair to tailgates, car camping or over the river to Grandma's house. Its durable construction and collapsible design make travel a breeze. Lightweight steel frame chair easily unfolds, locks into place for use, and folds back up in seconds. Features an eating tray with clear vinyl tray cover for easy cleaning; tray also has a built-in cup holder. Chair includes built-in lap belt to secure child while in chair. Ciao! Baby High Chair is ideal for children up to 3 years old; chair measures 32 x 23 x 23 in.
short_description: Take the Ciao! Baby High Chair to tailgates, car camping or over the river to Grandma's house. Its durable construction and collapsible design make travel a breeze.
